SVGLineElement.summary: The SVGLineElement interface provides access to the properties of line elements, as well as methods to manipulate them.

SVGLineElementX2.summary: The x2 read-only property of the interface describes the x-axis coordinate value of the end of a line as an . It reflects the {{SVGElement("line")}} element's {{SVGAttr("x2")}} geometric attribute.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is that end position along the x-axis in user coordinate system units.

SVGLineElementY1.summary: The y1 read-only property of the interface describes the start of the SVG line along the y-axis as an . It reflects the {{SVGElement("line")}} element's {{SVGAttr("y1")}} geometric attribute.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is that start position as a length along the y-axis in user coordinate system units.

SVGLineElementY2.summary: The y2 read-only property of the interface describes the v-axis coordinate value of the end of a line as an . It reflects the {{SVGElement("line")}} element's {{SVGAttr("y2")}} geometric attribute.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is that end position along the y-axis in user coordinate system units.

SVGLineElementX1.summary: The x1 read-only property of the interface describes the start of the SVG line along the x-axis as an . It reflects the {{SVGElement("line")}} element's {{SVGAttr("x1")}} geometric attribute.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is that start position as a length along the x-axis in user coordinate system units.
